page.title: 12New Forest
page.content: Forests are made of trees and sometimes people do like walking in the forest. Michelle Bisson 8.{Some {trees are 100's of years old and one {or two are a 1,000.}People might have planted them. Wayne Roper 8.{There are {so many trees in the forest. Paul {Bran 8.}There are some trees that are quite old but not very tall, this is because that every time the tree tries to grow the animals come along and eat off the shoots and the tree cannot grow.{When the Forestry Commission {plants trees they fence them in to {keep the animals out.}Pollarding. This is a way of cutting the head out of a tree to produce lots of branches, the head would be cut off six feet high so that the animals could not reach the new branches.{Any pollard tree must be {over 100 years old.}Mature oak trees date from about 1700.M.Bisson 8.
